alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Sanilac; Shiawassee; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:53PM EST until February 03 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Lapeer, Livingston, Sanilac, Macomb, Shiawassee, Genesee, St. Clair and Oakland Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light to moderate snowfall to continue through tonight with snowfall rates ranging between a quarter- inch to a half-inch per hour. Gusty north winds this afternoon and evening may lead to some blowing and drifting of snow and poor visibilities. Snow rates will drop off early Thursday morning and will lead to flurries or break in activity. Temperatures drop into the teens overnight with wind chills in the single digits. Untreated roadways with the colder temperatures will become slick.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Lapeer; Livingston; Macomb; Oakland; Sanilac; Shiawassee; St. Clair
